meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Zane Dowty Dana Thurmond Bruno Hunter Appler Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7322.

td.p: Zane Dowty, a pharmacist from Denver, Colorado
Dana Thurmond Bruno, a humanities professor from Orlando, Florida
Hunter Appler, an attorney originally from Mount Airy, North Carolina (whose 4-day cash winnings total $93,001)

tr.td: HISTORY REPEATS
THE ENTERTAINER
PATENTS
BIBLICAL ART
WHERE'S THAT STATE SCHOOL?
"EFF" FOR EFFORT

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_DJ_2_2', 'clue_DJ_2_2_stuck', '(Dana: I don\'t know. I\'m...)
(Alex: Take a guess.
(Dana: What is, uh, [*]?)
(Alex: That\'s right.)
(Dana: Oh! Ah...)
[Applause]
(Dana: Oh, wow! I guessed.)
(Alex: You see, I\'ve noticed quite often that our players know more than they are ready to admit.)

a champion

Dana
')
